alert.note: Alert for Central Chippewa; Western Chippewa (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued November 29 at 3:34PM EST until December 01 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Gaylord
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM WEDNESDAY TO 7 AM EST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Heavy lake effect snow and blowing snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 7 inches, with locally higher amounts possible. Winds gusting as high as 55 mph. * WHERE...Western Chippewa and Central Chippewa Counties. * WHEN...From 7 AM Wednesday to 7 AM EST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Blowing snow will significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions will impact the morning and evening commutes. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches and result in power outages. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Preceding rainfall and rapidly falling temperatures may lead to a flash freeze on area roadways Wednesday morning into the afternoon.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency.
